content:
Working with Forked repos # Merge changes from forked repo # For my neovim kickstart I have forked the https://github.com/nvim-lua/kickstart.nvim.git to sync my changes with this branch I need to regularly merge this branch master changes.
git remote add upstream https://github.com/nvim-lua/kickstart.nvim.git git fetch upstream # Checkout my branch in this case names are same git checkout master # Merge the original upstream git merge upsteam/master Git Push # Instead of providing branch name or set upstream branch we can always push current branch by
git config --global push.autoSetupRemote true
title: GitTips

content:
Martin Luther King Quotes # Tool Late # We are now faced with the fact that tomorrow is today. We are confronted with fierce urgency of now. In this unfolding conundrum of like and history there is a such thing as being too late. Procrastination is still the thief of time. Life often leaves us standing bare, naked and dejected with a lost opportunity. The tide in the affairs of men does not remain at the flood; it ebbs. We may cry out desperately for time to pause in her passage, but time is deaf to every plea and rush on. Over the bleached bones and jumbuled residue of numerous civilizations are written the pathetic word Too Late
Martin Luther King Jr.
Beyond Vietnam - a time to break silence
Shakespeare # Things without all remedy Should be without regard; what’s done is done.
summary: Writing hugo post in org mode
title: Quotes
